text.more: Color of edges , adjusted by the weigths which corresponds common number of publication. Size of nodes adjusted by Degree of that node.
text.intro: In this visualization, one may see the  faculty members' publication network between 2015-2019 in Sabanci University. Every node represents  instructors and edges represents they have common publication or not. For nodes, Red,Blue,Green represents FENS,FMAN,FASS respectively.
text.title: 2015-2019 Sabanci University Publication Network
